description: Dorogoza Island is rich in "Drop Energy" that players can use on friendly monsters. Once strong enough, they can face enemies in puzzle wars.

REGULAR.description:
Ace, a boy in Vienna City living an average life, finds a mysterious egg calling for his name. Little does he know that the egg is a special "Drop" that both Lance, the Dragon Caller, and the Special Drop Defensive Force are looking for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドロップ・インパクト

REGULAR.description:
Lance fights the Chaos Devil Dragon, but has a difficult time due to SDF`s intervention. The special egg speaks to Ace, and Ace is able to create more Drops for Lance, leading to victory. Curious about everything, Ace goes to the Dragon Museum.
Source: crunchyroll

Tamazo, the special egg that hatched, gets kidnapped by the SDF. In order to rescue him, Ace and Charo sneaks inside the SDF base. After successfully rescuing Tamazo, Charo convinces Ace to go to Dragoza Island with him to become Dragon Callers together.
Source: crunchyroll

Ace, Tamazo, and Charo safely arrives on Dragoza Island. When he visits his grandmother, she gives him a D-Gear; a device used by Dragon Callers. Eager to try it out, Ace goes into the woods to find a monster that would become his ally.
Source: crunchyroll

Obtaining D-Gear and his first monster, Ouka, Ace wants to take the next step - getting his hands on a Soul Armor. Donny tells them that he can find one at the Sacred Temple, but warns that everyone who has set foot there have never returned...
Source: crunchyroll

Ace quickly takes another step forward in becoming a strong Dragon Caller as he welcomes another monster to his team. He builds his confidence from this, but, he may be biting off more than he could chew when he goes off to stop a Drop Impact himself.
Source: crunchyroll

To become a stronger Dragon Caller, Ace goes into training under Herriot`s wing. Just when he completes his training, he learns of the Guild Dragon Caller`s exam. Will he be able to pass the exam and become a Guild Dragon Caller?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Path to Guild Dragon Caller

REGULAR.description:
Ace faces his final test in his Guild Dragon Caller`s exam - a one-on-one battle with Morgan, the Dragon Caller of Dark. She has her "stud-monster," Vampire Lord, and isn`t holding back. Can Ace and his team withstand her attacks and win the battle?
Source: crunchyroll

Ace and his friends arrive at the Fire City Geyser, when Garnet calls them over to help out at her concert. There, they meet Tiger, a man from Geyser with flaming-hot passion. When the Drop Impact hits during the concert, it`s up to them to save the day.
Source: crunchyroll

To figure out why the hot spring has turned into water, Ace and his friends goes to find the monster that acts as a heat source. There, they find Salamander in a weakened state. They find a way to help him, but their plan may have backfired...
Source: crunchyroll

With the Ancient of Wood, Tinbell, taking ill, he decided to step down and named two candidates as the next Ancient; One of whom is the one who saved Charo`s life. However, not being able to handle the pressure very well, his odds doesn`t look so good...
Source: crunchyroll

As the new Ancient of Wood, Torlie is put to the test to prove he`s worthy, but he still hasn`t overcome his stage-fright. Meanwhile, Ace and his friends go inside the woods in search of Charo`s D-Gear, but something is very wrong there...
Source: crunchyroll

It`s Charo`s first time, Ace`s second time, and Tiger`s, well, eleventh time taking the Guild Dragon Caller`s Exam. But their last test is a battle against Lance. Lance allows all three of them to fight him at once, but can they still manage to beat him?
Source: crunchyroll

Ace returns to Vienna City to let his mom know that he`s now an official Guild Dragon Caller. Lena`s proud of him, but when another monster goes on a rampage, Lena lets her worry get the best of her and goes to find Ace...
Source: crunchyroll

In order to get ready for the Battle Cup, Ace and his friends head to Sand City, Vegahs to hone their skills as Dragon Callers. There, Tiger is conned into a fixed match, but Entetsu, a monster that saved Tiger before, comes to save him again.
Source: crunchyroll

To find his dream-monster, Toyceratops, Charo and his friends head to Woodstorm, a forest where many rare monsters reside. There, they meet Garnet, who has been tasked to hunt ghosts. Reluctantly, they join Garnet and goes into a haunted mansion...
Source: crunchyroll

Ace takes on a mission with Lance to deal with a dragon on rampage. However, they soon learn that the dragon has his reasons to be upset - the Egg Drop trafficking organization hunted his friends. Will Ace and Lance be able to save the other dragons?
Source: crunchyroll

When Lance was just a little boy, the Drop Impact took away everything from him - his house, his mom, his dad. After that, Lance was on his own, until he met Devi. The two became good friends and spent their time together, until one day...
Source: crunchyroll

Torlie goes into the forest to investigate the cause of increased Drops in the area, and Ace and his friends tag along. There, they find a monster, Fortoytops, suffering from taking in too much Drops. To save him, Charo steps up to the challenge.
Source: crunchyroll

Tiger meets his old childhood friend - Rose. They have a friendly competition to see who`ll find the Red Carbuncle first. With a little tough love, Tiger realizes that he hasn`t accomplished anything by himself yet, and makes a tough decision.
Source: crunchyroll

Thinking about dropping his mom a line, Ace reflects on what had happened since he first left his hometown, Vienna City. His first D-Gear, his first friend, his first monster, and when he finally became a Guild Dragon Caller. So much has happened!
Source: crunchyroll

At a school where they train children with the potential to become Dragon Callers, Garnet is invited as a guest speaker. She remembers what it was like when she was a student there herself, and Valkyrie never made her school-life any easier.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 我が青春のヴァルキリー

REGULAR.description:
Ace and Sonia visit an island where "Death" has been sighted. This monster is a dangerous monster that controls other monsters to harm people. In the island, they also find unbalance in the Drops and SDF`s secret base. Could everything be related?
Source: crunchyroll

Ace and the gang goes to the Light City and hears about the almighty Dragon Caller, Sturgeon. Hoping they can get some training from him, they set off to find him with a boy named "Astell." However, they soon find out who the boy really is...
Source: crunchyroll

Defeated by Sturgeon, Ace seeks more strength. However, he doesn`t know how to achieve that. Grasping at straws, he ignores Tamazo`s warning and listens to a mysterious e-mail he receives. Unfortunately, the e-mail leads them to a Drop Impact site...
Source: crunchyroll

Ace and Tamazo head to the Duen Desert to find a monster called god. Ace is so fixated on becoming strong that he doesn`t realize he`s forgotten something very important as a Dragon Caller. Will the god find Ace unworthy, or will Ace open his eyes?
Source: crunchyroll

Finally, the annual Battle Cup has started! Ace, along with all the other Dragon Callers, are eager to show off their strengths in the tournament. However, Ace`s opponent for the first match is... Tiger! Does Ace stand a chance against him?
Source: crunchyroll

After going their separate ways, Tiger finally understands what it means to be strong. Ace remembers what Sonia said as well, and puts it together to activate Soul Brave. Succeeding in his bold move, Ace defeats Tiger and moves on to the next match!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s the second round in the Battle Cup, and Garnet`s opponent is Klein. Despite her efforts, Klein seems to be have the upper hand, and things aren`t looking so good for Garnet. In order to live up to her fans` faith, Garnet makes a decision...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヴァルキリーの目覚め

REGULAR.description:
Winning his second round by default, Ace fights Charo next. They both agree to give the battle 100%, but Ace lets their friendship get in the way. Not being able to synchronize with Horus, can Ace overcome this obstacle, or will his battle end here?
Source: crunchyroll

The twin sisters, Herriot and Morgan, fights for the class A semi-finals. They each have 15 wins and 15 losses fighting each other, and are determined to settle this once and for all in this battle, using Soul Brave. Which one will come out victorious?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dragon Caller of Light and Dark

REGULAR.description:
It`s Garnet vs. Star John, and while she uses her skills for a massive attack twice in a row, it still wasn`t enough to take him down. Garnet`s defeat seems to have triggered something for Morgan, but even her twin sister, Herriot doesn`t know what.
Source: crunchyroll

In class C finals, Ace battles Kroell. With Kroell`s leader skill cutting his Dark-attribute attacks in half, Ace has a hard time dealing damage against Kroell. However, seeing how poorly Kroell treats his monsters, this is a fight Ace cannot lose.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 非道! クロエルの鞭

REGULAR.description:
The last remaining finals is class A, Harriot versus Lance. Losing to Lance once, Harriot is determined to win this time. She feels confident that the lifting of the ban on Soul Brave will work to her advantage, but will Lance be able to prove her wrong?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Strongest of All Dragon Callers

REGULAR.description:
With the winners from each class now determined, the Representative Battle begins! First off is class B champion, Starjohn, versus class C champion, Ace. Ace has already lost to Starjohn once; will he be able to win this time?
Source: crunchyroll

Finally, the fight everyone`s been waiting for. Ace wants to win, not so much as winning the tournament but as defeating Lance. Ace is going to give everything he`s got, but it looks like Lance isn`t going to hold back either. Will Ace be able to win?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激突! エースvsランス

REGULAR.description:
Ace is able to successfully bring out Horus` power and his strong will to win this battle is pushing him to the extreme. Unfortunately, his Soul Armor reaches its limit before Ace does. However, that still isn`t enough to stop Ace from pushing harder.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激闘! ランスvsエース

REGULAR.description:
Ace`s strong emotion to become stronger in order to defeat Lance has triggered something inside him, but it seems he has lost himself in all that power. In order to keep the playing field level, Lance is forced to step up his game, too.
Source: crunchyroll

The Battle Cup finally ends, and Tiger, Charo, and other Dragon Callers all go their separate ways, looking forward to the day they meet and battle again. Ace is no exception, and is asked to go on a quest to find Morgan, who has gone missing.
Source: crunchyroll

In search of Morgan, Ace and Garnet reaches the Light City and learn of a "suspicious Dragon Caller" looking for Vampire Lords. Could that be Morgan? Meanwhile, the Ancients hold a meeting to discuss what the take-away should be from the Battle Cup.
Source: crunchyroll

Ace and Garnet arrives at the Dark City, Zelemony. There, they find out that someone`s been targeting female Dragon Callers and stealing their Egg Drops. Does this have something to do with Morgan`s disappearance? Ace and Garnet is determined to find out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 奪われたエッグドロップ

REGULAR.description:
Ace and Garnet visits Charo and Torlie to see if they know something about Morgan. Torlie shares his suspicion of foul play during the Drop Impact when Dafnes went missing. Just then, their forest is under attack, with multiple Drop Impacts triggered.
Source: crunchyroll

Ace and Garnet goes back to Zelemony, but something is very wrong at the city. While looking around, they find Tiger, who`s on a mission to find those responsible for hurting the monsters in the area. Can they restore the city to its original state?
Source: crunchyroll

Starting with Morgan, other Guild Dragon Callers have gone missing as well, seemingly joining the mysterious organization. Lance is also missing, but does that mean he betrayed the Guild as well? Ace goes to find Lance to find out what is going on.
Source: crunchyroll

Morgan, a member of the Dominion, destroys the Dragon God Statue, triggering a Drop Impact. Ace and Garnet prevents the catastrophe, but Haru is blamed, just for being human. Ace is shocked to see such discrimination, but can he change the world?
Source: crunchyroll

When Angene releases a monster called Myr, the Keeper of Time, Ace is shown the past, when his father, King, and his grandmother, Angene, still lived in the Dragonoid`s Village, Stella. Ace learns how his father`s ability as a Dragon Caller was awoken.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Crack in the Round Table

REGULAR.description:
When Angene releases a monster called Myr, the Keeper of Time, Ace is shown the past, when his father, King, and his grandmother, Angene, still lived in the Dragonoid`s Village, Stella. Ace learns how his father`s ability as a Dragon Caller was awoken.
Source: crunchyroll

To tell the people in Stella that they`re in danger, Ace and Garnet goes on a mission to find the key to Stella - the legendary dragon. With Sonia`s help, they reach their destination, but apparently, they aren`t the only ones looking for the key...
Source: crunchyroll

On their way to Stella, Ace and the gang arrives at Starjohn`s castle. As the last member of his family, Starjohn continues to serve as the protector of Stella. However, the Dominion also shows up, triggering multiple Drop Impacts. What will they do?
Source: crunchyroll

Guided by the Three Moon Compass, Ace and Tamazo arrives in a familiar area. Inside the sacred forest, they meet a mysterious girl. After finding Stella, Ace tells them they`re in grave danger, but the Elder doesn`t seem to want any help from humans...
Source: crunchyroll

Determined to find Stella, Morgan is finally on the move. She releases the sealed dragon, Dark Apocalypse to force open the path to Stella. However, with the legendary Brave Cross Dragon on his team, Ace will do everything he can to save Stella.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mittsu o Tsuki no Shita de

REGULAR.description:
To prepare for another threat like the Dominion, Jest has formed an elite squad called the Guardians. Hosting the Grand Battle Cup, he hopes to recruit Dragon Callers worthy of joining the squad. However, something fishy is going on in the tournament...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: グランド・バトルカップ開幕!

REGULAR.description:
Although Stella`s Elder, Hofs, disagreed to share the secret of Reversion, Lance hasn`t given up. He tag-teams with Ana to figure out where the secret is hidden. However, with that and his painful memory from the past, Devi`s more than worried for him.
Source: crunchyroll

The fierce battle in the Grand Battle Cup continues, with Garnet fighting against Cynthia, her junior friend in the Dragon Caller Academy. Starjohn also fights against Blitz, who seems to have some kind of beef with the Starjohn family.
Source: crunchyroll

Match one of round two starts off with Tiger fighting a masked opponent, Zyoot. Angry about what Zyoot did to Rose, losing isn`t an option for Tiger. Fighting another masked opponent is Starjohn, who also wants his revenge on what they did to his castle.
Source: crunchyroll

Ace`s next match is against Mere, representing the Dark City. For some reason, Mere sees Ace as a rival, but he eventually explains why. Garnet`s also up against Ost, and despite her best efforts, she quickly learns that Ost is on a different level.
Source: crunchyroll

Instead of participating in the Grand Battle Cup, Charo stays behind to do some research to figure out Dominion`s true intent. His hard work pays off and Charo makes sense of what might have happened in the Dragon`s Graveyard, but could it be too late?
Source: crunchyroll

The second semi-final match is Ace vs Tiger. They`ve both trained hard for this day and aren`t going to hold back! Meanwhile, Lance is still looking for the secret to Reversion in Stella. Something is going on with Devi, but is it related to the secret?
Source: crunchyroll

Lance learns that someone in Luna was conducting a research on Star Fragment. Hearing about his hometown, Lance decides to stop by, bringing back painful memories. They find a secret passage, and Lance learns the truth about what happened... Or does he?
Source: crunchyroll

The finals for the Grand Battle Cup is about to start! Ace is up against Ost, the leader of Dominion with strong power. This is his opportunity to stop Dominion once and for all, but will he succeed? And is Ost really Dafnes, or could it be someone else?
Source: crunchyroll

The Grand Battle Cup ends with Ace as the winner. His friends congratulate him, but Ace is disappointed that he couldn`t fight Lance. His wish is granted but not in the way he had hoped. Lance is losing control, going through some kind of transformation.
Source: crunchyroll

Lance is forced to go into Reversion, losing himself in the power. Just when it seemed Ana got to Lance in time, the Star Fragment completely consumes him. With the other Ancients` hands tied, it`s up to Ace to stop Lance, but will he succeed?
Source: crunchyroll

Ace tries to fight Lance, but the power of Reversion is too great. To make things worse, Eldora also decides to Revert, causing the ley line to go haywire, throwing Dragoza Island into chaos. Just when it seemed all hopes were lost, a savior appears...
Source: crunchyroll

An unfortunate scheduling conflict forces the studio to have Tamazo host a different show today. Instead of our regular Puzzle & Dragons X anime, Tamazo will be hosting "Tama/Devi Best 10!" What`s hot right now in Dragoza? And what about the new monster?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: タマタマ行くならこんな島

REGULAR.description:
Defeated by Lance, Ace was taken to Stella to recover. However, he wakes up only to find out that he has lost his power as a Dragon Caller. Seeing how devasted Ace is, Hofs tells him of an old legend that has been passed down in Stella.
Source: crunchyroll

To get his power back as a Dragon Caller, Ace heads to Mount Saul. There, he meets the Pure Light Sun Deity, Ra, and a cute little tamadra. Ace must pass Ra`s trial to reclaim his power back, but he will have to pay with his soul if he fails...
Source: crunchyroll

To find his friends, Ace sets off to Dark City, Zelemony. There, he finds out that they`re all wanted by Dominion. Luckily, he joins up with Garnet, and together they walk around the city trying to find Guild`s secret base they heard about.
Source: crunchyroll

Ace, Tamazo, and Garnet goes to the Water City to find Herriot and Morgan. They`re relieved to see the two sisters seemingly doing well, enjoying a peaceful life hidden from the world. However, Garnet thinks there`s still some awkwardness between them.
Source: crunchyroll

Looking for his friends that`ll fight with him alongside against the Dominion, Ace and Garnet arrives in Linus. However, when Tamazo jumps at an opportunity to eat jelly dumplings, they`re spotted by the Dominion. How will they get out of this mess?
Source: crunchyroll

The Dragon Caller Academy is an all-girls school where they teach students how to become a Dragon Caller. However, ever since the Dominion took over the world, the Academy has changed for the worse. Can Garnet, Academy`s alumni, make things right?
Source: crunchyroll

Ace and Garnet reaches Geyser. There, they meet Tiger, who seemed to have lost his will to climb to new heights. He`s making a living playing the villain on a "hero show" where Aget is pretending to be Golden Wings. Can Ace get back Tiger`s spunk?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アングリー・タイガー

REGULAR.description:
Ace, Garnet, Tamazo, and Tiger head to Libria and join up with Charo. A once lush but now lifeless Wood City has fallen into chaos as Dominion rule the city and their Tree of Life withering away... To top it all off, angry monsters are headed their way!
Source: crunchyroll

When Sonia arrives in Libria, she sees humans and Dragonoids hurting the forest. Anger consumes Sonia, causing the monsters to wreak havoc on the city. When Ace tries to calm Sonia down, it reminds her of the time she first met King...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sonia and the Tree of Life

REGULAR.description:
Based on intel from Sonia, Ace and the gang head toward the Waterfall Cavern, where people from the Guild is gathered. At the same time, Ana left Stella with Angene to visit Crocus. She`s excited to see the outside world for the first time, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Lance starts attacking Crocus to lure Golden Wings, causing Vahaton to come out of hiding. Knowing the kindness in Lance, Vahaton is determined to save Lance. Vahaton risks his life using Reversion, but is this what Lance really wants?
Source: crunchyroll

Willingly accepting the Star Fragment`s power and his Reversion state, Lance continues his attack on everyone and everything. Crocus falls into chaos, and Ace is determined to stop Lance, to save Lance... It`s the final show-down between the two rivals!
Source: crunchyroll

After the battle between Ace and Lance, Drop Impacts have become a frequent occurrence around Crocus. Everyone is busy trying to dissipate them when Charo finds out where Torlie is being held. He decides to go rescue Torlie himself, but was that wise?
Source: crunchyroll

Eldora has finally woken up. Although worried about Geyser, she has yet to fully recover. On her behalf, Ace, Tiger, and Garnet goes to Geyser to check up on the city. There, they encounter a fort that Dominion has built, threatening everyone in Geyser.
Source: crunchyroll

Going after Kroell, Ace and his friends find themselves in Zelemony. With Mere as their leader, the Guild Dragon Callers are fighting back to win back their city from the Dominion. However, Dominion has an evil plan to win back the people.
Source: crunchyroll

To defeat Jest, Ace and the whole gang head to Exscion. Expecting their arrival, Jest had powerful monsters on stand-by. With his friends` help, Ace finally reaches the top, but struggles to fight off Kroell, powered up by his "bond" with Lucifer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Head to the Tower of Light!

REGULAR.description:
With Jest defeated and the Dominion no more, peace is restored. Meanwhile, Devi and Lance are spending quality time and getting their much-needed rest. However, not healing well, Devi collapses, and Lance struggles to find a way to save him.
Source: crunchyroll

With order back in Dragoza, humans are moving back to the island every day. The Guild is back in power and all seems right in the world. However, there seems to be something odd going on with the Drops that are scaring the monsters...
Source: crunchyroll

With Satan`s help, Jest is back to wreak havoc, and completely breaks its seal and frees Satan by feeding him all those Drops. The SDF uses all the firepower they`ve got, but isn`t enough to stop Satan. Now it`s up to Ace to save the world.
Source: crunchyroll

Sealing the agreement with the King of Hell, Satan, Jest has regained his power, and then some. Jest`s wrath and his belief that every living being in the planet is worthless clashes with Ace, but his force is too great for Ace to stop alone...
Source: crunchyroll

Ace and Lance finally join forces to take down Jest. However, that doesn`t stop Jest from absorbing alarming amounts of the Drops. The decrease in Drops is slowly killing all monsters... Ace and Lance will need to put a stop to this madness, quickly!
Source: crunchyroll

Jest continues to consume the Drops from the whole planet and there`s hardly any left for Ace and Lance to fight back. But that doesn`t mean they`ll give up! Lance realizes that Ace`s special ability is how they`ll open their way to victory.
Source: crunchyroll

Ace and Lance manage to defeat Jest, but before they can celebrate, darkness starts to engulf the entire planet. Hofs explains that it is the will of this planet, the will of Terra Dragon. To save their planet and everyone they love, they head to Ymir.
Source: crunchyroll

Ace and Lance reach Ymir and find King there. The five of them try to convince Terra Dragon to change its mind, but it is determined to destroy the current planet in order to recreate another without anguish. Will they be able to protect their planet?
Source: crunchyroll
